text.paragraph1: Nerves. Time. Technology. There are many factors that keep people from being as productive as they can be. By identifying these distractions and eliminating them, you can save your business time and money.
text.paragraph2: Learn how to phase out your problem spots with "6 Ways to Stop Wasting Time So You Can be More Productive."
text.quickTip: Set a timer and promise yourself you'll work, uninterrupted for 20 minutes. Then take a 20 minute break and repeat until done.
